Here is an example of a pixel matrix which forms a simple heart shape, represented using a single color (red) on a white background:

[ (255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255) ]
[ (255, 255, 255)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 255, 255)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255) ]
[ (255, 255, 255)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255) ]
[ (255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 255, 255) ]
[ (255, 255, 255)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255) ]
[ (255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 0, 0)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255) ]
[ (255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 0, 0)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255)(255, 255, 255) ]
